column4: is there a way to reinstall 12.04 from the command line to skip the grub stage, which seems to always mess up my system
start from the beginning, where do things go wrong
i don't like/use unity, but there's the command unity --reset
there's also this, but it's more drastic gconftool-2 --recursive-unset /apps/compiz && compiz --replace <enter>
